text:
TELEGRAM
NIGHT LETTER COLLECT
TO: Anna L. Hyer
FROM: Skomia
Unless time requirements extremely modest, should not accept. Could advise
on policy but too covered with paper work now to agree to review more than
2 or 3 articles yearly. Therefore if accept, would be with those limitations
Do not feel it fair accept position unless able XBX fill it.
MpJ
SENT
IMMM3X BY Ly
DATE 2/7/56
